result.reason: Improves usability by allowing users to see the size of folders in the connection tree at a glance.
result.approach: Modify the ConnectionTree rendering logic to append a connection count to folder nodes (e.g., 'FolderName (5)'). This will require calculating the count of descendant connections and updating the node text when the tree is loaded or modified.

attempts.raw_output:
{
"decision": "implement",
"reason": "Improves usability by allowing users to see the size of folders in the connection tree at a glance.",
"priority": "P3-enhancement",
"estimated_files": ["mRemoteNG/UI/Controls/ConnectionTree.cs", "mRemoteNG/Tree/ConnectionTreeModel.cs"],
"approach": "Modify the ConnectionTree rendering logic to append a connection count to folder nodes (e.g., 'FolderName (5)'). This will require calculating the count of descendant connections and updating the node text when the tree is loaded or modified."
}
